author: franzoni
body:
This is a rebase of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18912:

+ Concerns offline PF charged hadron calibration.
  Summary can be found here:  
  https://spandey.web.cern.ch/spandey/files/slides/PF_Calibration_PPD_18May2017.pdf

with in addition the changes to the global tags to assess consistently code changes and conditions changes, for the deployment of the 2017 Had PF calibration
title: Pf hadron calibration offline (reb) w/ AlCa updates
